name: Evoverse Shard
description: EVOVERSE is a turn-based Blockchain strategy game. It takes place in a futuristic universe where robots have become conscious and have begun a migratory process across the vastness of the universe. Your goal is to collect and organize data about the robot's ancestors and the origin of the universe. An adventure full of possibilities of achievements with lots of adrenaline and the best of all, cash earnings!
